sentence: 1980s decor gets top dollar
For the cost of this hotel I was expecting nicer facilities and larger rooms
Beach chairs and umbrellas are not included so be ready to pay for that
As a mother of two kids that works a full time job i expect that when i pay alot of money for a hotel i expect it to at least be worth what i spent
We have stayed at actual resorts and this just leaves a lot to be desired especially considering you are paying 300 a night
I booked and paid for Double Room 2 Double Beds View on Hotelscom
We had been driving all night and checked in at 4 6 am and had to pay the entire night
For 200 dollars a night I think it is overpriced
The people that work there lied to us over the phone and charged us a different rate then discussed on the phone and the manger did nothing about it
The swim up bar was fun we had good drinks there though they seemed a bit expensive for what we got
But very disappointed with the price I paid for a hotel that needs some major work
Tho location for price was well worth it
Of all of the hotels in the area that are not condos this is by far my favorite and has the best amenities around including hotels that cost twice as much
Breakfast was good but over priced
all of themit is an older facility so it could use some upgrades in the rooms but it was clean and you can not beat the price
Stayed for a discounted rate but would not have been happy if I paid full price
They offer a decent breakfast buffet for a price
They did move us but we had to pay a great deal more for this move
ALWAYS WELCOMING OVER AND BEYOND FANCIER MORE COSTLY PLACES
Definitely worth what we paid for our vacation
I ’ve traveled all around the world and can honestly say I ’ve yet to find a better place within my price range
The food at the island grille was good and reasonably priced

I booked my room five 5 months prior to our stay to ensure we would have the room we desired as we do not travel often and I wanted this to be a nice weekend at the beach for my wife also with today being Mothers DaybrOnce checked in we made our way to our room to find the Gulf view king room I had paid for was not what we had received
Price was awesome I will stay here again
I ’ve never had an experience like this before with any resort and for the amount of money we paid I expected better quality
